Hi, All:

Has any one tried the flow device part or have an example code which 
I can share with. Basically, I would like to link a flow controler 
and a pressure controller with a stirred reactor (Zero-D model) to 
see how that works in Cantera.

Any ideal?

Thanks in advance

Yi
